TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CCClippingNode extends Cocos2D.CCNode

Docs.summary: is a subclass of . It draws its content (childs) clipped using a stencil. The stencil is an other that will not be drawn. The clipping is done using the alpha part of the stencil (adjusted with an alphaThreshold).
Docs.remarks: <para> <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCClippingNode" /> is a subclass of <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCNode" />. It draws its content (childs) clipped using a stencil. The stencil is an other <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCNode" /> that will not be drawn. The clipping is done using the alpha part of the stencil (adjusted with an alphaThreshold). </para><see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCClippingNode" /><see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCNode" /><see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCNode" />

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates and initializes a clipping node with an other node as its stencil. The stencil node will be retained.
Docs.remarks: Creates and initializes a clipping node with an other node as its stencil. The stencil node will be retained.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class Cocos2D.CCNode stencil) cil managed

Docs.summary: The alpha threshold. The content is drawn only where the stencil have pixel with alpha greater than the alphaThreshold. Should be a float between 0 and 1. This default to 1 (so alpha test is disabled).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Init() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a clipping node with an other node as its stencil. The stencil node will be retained, and its parent will be set to this clipping node.
Docs.remarks: Initializes a clipping node with an other node as its stencil. The stencil node will be retained, and its parent will be set to this clipping node.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Init(class Cocos2D.CCNode stencil) cil managed
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void OnEnter() cil managed

Docs.summary: Event callback that is invoked every time when enters the 'stage'. If the enters the 'stage' with a transition, this event is called when the transition starts. During onEnter you can't access a "sister/brother" node. If you override onEnter, you shall call its parent's one, e.g., Node::onEnter().
Docs.remarks: <para>Event callback that is invoked every time when <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCNode" /> enters the 'stage'. If the <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCNode" /> enters the 'stage' with a transition, this event is called when the transition starts. During onEnter you can't access a "sister/brother" node. If you override onEnter, you shall call its parent's one, e.g., <ref refid="classcocos2d_1_1_node_1a35211ff3db90acb4bca5d92edd6f3dde" kindref="member">Node::onEnter()</ref>. </para><see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCNode" /><see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCNode" /><ref refid="classcocos2d_1_1_node_1a35211ff3db90acb4bca5d92edd6f3dde" kindref="member">Node::onEnter()</ref>

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void OnEnterTransitionDidFinish() cil managed

Docs.summary: Event callback that is invoked when the enters in the 'stage'. If the enters the 'stage' with a transition, this event is called when the transition finishes. If you override onEnterTransitionDidFinish, you shall call its parent's one, e.g. Node::onEnterTransitionDidFinish()
Docs.remarks: <para>Event callback that is invoked when the <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCNode" /> enters in the 'stage'. If the <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCNode" /> enters the 'stage' with a transition, this event is called when the transition finishes. If you override onEnterTransitionDidFinish, you shall call its parent's one, e.g. <ref refid="classcocos2d_1_1_node_1a7f705fa89d29ed4efda768865d1728d3" kindref="member">Node::onEnterTransitionDidFinish()</ref></para><see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCNode" /><see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCNode" /><ref refid="classcocos2d_1_1_node_1a7f705fa89d29ed4efda768865d1728d3" kindref="member">Node::onEnterTransitionDidFinish()</ref>

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void OnExit() cil managed

Docs.summary: Event callback that is invoked every time the leaves the 'stage'. If the leaves the 'stage' with a transition, this event is called when the transition finishes. During onExit you can't access a sibling node. If you override onExit, you shall call its parent's one, e.g., Node::onExit().
Docs.remarks: <para>Event callback that is invoked every time the <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCNode" /> leaves the 'stage'. If the <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCNode" /> leaves the 'stage' with a transition, this event is called when the transition finishes. During onExit you can't access a sibling node. If you override onExit, you shall call its parent's one, e.g., <ref refid="classcocos2d_1_1_node_1a3a43c10832c787f6e2ca437c3ecc8dd3" kindref="member">Node::onExit()</ref>. </para><see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCNode" /><see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCNode" /><ref refid="classcocos2d_1_1_node_1a3a43c10832c787f6e2ca437c3ecc8dd3" kindref="member">Node::onExit()</ref>

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void OnExitTransitionDidStart() cil managed

Docs.summary: Event callback that is called every time the leaves the 'stage'. If the leaves the 'stage' with a transition, this callback is called when the transition starts.
Docs.remarks: <para>Event callback that is called every time the <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCNode" /> leaves the 'stage'. If the <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCNode" /> leaves the 'stage' with a transition, this callback is called when the transition starts. </para><see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCNode" /><see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCNode" />

Docs.summary: The to use as a stencil to do the clipping. The stencil node will be retained. This default to nil.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Visit() cil managed

Docs.summary: Visits this node's children and draw them recursively.
Docs.remarks: Visits this node's children and draw them recursively.
